title: ETSI Domain Application + Tourism
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: etsi-domain-application-tourism-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20339
	- preferred-term:: ETSI Domain Application + Tourism
	- status:: draft
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Cross-domain marker for metaverse application components focused on tourism and hospitality including virtual tours, destination previews, cultural heritage experiences, and travel planning platforms in immersive environments.
	- source:: [[ETSI GS MEC]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: mv:ETSIDomainApplicationTourism
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:VirtualObject
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[InfrastructureDomain]], [[VirtualSocietyDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[ApplicationLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: etsi-domain-application-tourism-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Extended Reality (XR)]]
		- is-part-of:: [[ETSI Domain Taxonomy]]
		- enables:: [[Tourism Application Classification]]
		- enables:: [[Cultural Experience Categorization]]
		- categorizes:: [[Virtual Tour]]
		- categorizes:: [[Destination Preview]]
		- categorizes:: [[Travel Planning Platform]]
		- categorizes:: [[Cultural Heritage Experience]]
		- depends-on:: [[VirtualSocietyDomain]]
		- depends-on:: [[InfrastructureDomain]]

ontology.definition: Cross-domain marker for metaverse application components focused on tourism and hospitality including virtual tours, destination previews, cultural heritage experiences, and travel planning platforms in immersive environments.
